java/liquibase/database/sql/AddDefaultValueStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 
00005 public class AddDefaultValueStatement implements SqlStatement {
00006     private String schemaName;
00007     private String tableName;
00008     private String columnName;
00009     private Object defaultValue;
00010 
00011 
00012     public AddDefaultValueStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName, Object defaultValue) {
00013         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00014         this.tableName = tableName;
00015         this.columnName = columnName;
00016         this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00020         return true;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) {
00024         if (database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00025             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " REPLACE " + getColumnName() + " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00026         } else if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00027             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD CONSTRAINT " + ((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue()) + " FOR " + getColumnName();
00028         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00029             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER " + getColumnName() + " SET DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00030         } else if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00031             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + getColumnName() + " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00032         } else if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00033             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + getColumnName() + " WITH DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00034         } else if (database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00035                         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " COLUMN  " + getColumnName() + " ADD DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00036         }
00037 
00038         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + getColumnName() + " SET DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getColumnName() {
00042         return columnName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getSchemaName() {
00046         return schemaName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getTableName() {
00050         return tableName;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00054         return ";";
00055     }
00056 
00057     public Object getDefaultValue() {
00058         return defaultValue;
00059     }
00060 }
